full_summary:
### Standing Offer for Chain Link Fence Installation and Repair at CFB Gagetown, Oromocto, NB

#### Notice Details

- **Reference**: WS4360827232
- **Public Notice Date**: December 19, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 10, 2024, 2:00 PM (local time)
- **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
- **Procurement Category**: *SRV (Services)*

#### Procurement Information

- **Appeal Type**: Competitive procedure with open bidding
- **Contract Term**: Two (2) years from April 1, 2024 to March 31, 2026, with an option for two (2) additional one (1)-year terms
- **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
- **Regions of Delivery**: *New Brunswick*
- **UNSPSC Code**: *30152000 - Fencing*

#### Description of Work

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of CFB Gagetown, has a requirement for a Standing Offer for chain link installation and repair services. This procurement includes furnishing labour, materials, equipment, and supervision for the installation and repair of chain link fences and gates as needed at 5 CDSB Gagetown in Oromocto, NB.

#### Requirements

- Installation and repair of chain link fences and gates
- Provision of all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and expenses
- Capacity to work on-site and deliver services as and when required
- Ability to meet the requirements outlined in the standing offer agreement

#### Important Details

- This standing offer is valid until it is supplemented or expires.
- This posting is to solicit bids from interested suppliers.
- **Congressional Act on Free Trade Agreements** applies to this procurement.

If you require more information, please contact Bryant, Gary (SPAC/PSPC) at [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
